solution_line_template: After putting {eggs_in_fridge} eggs in the fridge, the chef has {total_eggs} - {eggs_in_fridge} = <<{total_eggs}-{eggs_in_fridge}={eggs_for_cakes}>>{eggs_for_cakes} eggs left to make cakes.
Since it takes {eggs_per_cake} eggs to make one cake, the chef can make {eggs_for_cakes} eggs / {eggs_per_cake} eggs per cake = <<{eggs_for_cakes}/{eggs_per_cake}={num_cakes}>>{num_cakes} cakes.
